title: Putin's Propaganda Chief Urges 'War Over People's Minds' on Russia's Home Front
description: In a speech revealing Kremlin efforts to bolster domestic support for its war in Ukraine, Sergei Kiriyenko told state officials they are ‘special forces’ fighting an information war.

title: Many of Ukraine's Western Weapons Await Repairs Far From the Front Line
description: Some of the most powerful weapons that the West gave to Ukraine have been languishing for prolonged periods because of complex maintenance procedures and quarrels among European allies.

title: Hong Kong Media Tycoon Jimmy Lai Gets Another Jail Term
description: The case is the latest in a legal campaign against Mr. Lai, whose now-closed Apple Daily newspaper was once one of Beijing’s fiercest critics.

title: Russia Launches New Drone Attacks as Partnership With Iran Deepens
description: The fresh attacks are an indication that Moscow has replenished its supply of Iranian-made drones, as the two countries move toward what the U.S. has called a full defense partnership.

title: Japan Clamps Down on Moon Church's Fundraising
description: Parliament is banning high-pressure tactics cited by the suspect in the assassination of former Prime Minister Shinzo Abe.
